Client.Name: Hangzhou Aiyao Medical Health Technology Co., Ltd.

Project.Brief history of your project and organi:
Hangzhou Aiyao Medical Health Technology Co., Ltd ("Aiyao") was established in Hangzhou in 2019 by divesting itself from Tencent Group, with Tencent Group still as its controlling shareholder.

The company was founded based on the informationization of the medical industry, while focusing on the creation of health education short video content, and gradually transformed into a life entertainment health management ecological builder "with the core goal of achieving a comfortable and happy healthy life for users".

At present, the company has accumulated a large number of users, and in the future, the company will continue to expand the richness of content in the field of short video, and gradually transform into a full ecological builder in the field of short video.
Project.Describe the data being stored onto File: Short videos or photos of food, pets, scenery and recreational activities created and uploaded by users, the official website is currently in the pre-construction stage, we will continue to improve
Project.In which geographies do you plan on maki: Greater China, Asia other than Greater China, Africa, North America, South America, Europe, Australia (continent), Antarctica
Project.How will you be distributing your data t: HTTP or FTP server, Shipping hard drives
